genre_description: A bureaucratic mystery and political thriller focusing on systemic corruption and environmental justice.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced, city-integrated AI system that assists the Planning Director in managing municipal data and oversight.

behaviors.description: Conducts a comprehensive impact assessment of Marcus's career, uncovering systemic biases in city planning approvals.
behaviors.quote: During your tenure as City Planning Director, your department processed approximately forty-seven hundred individual applications... however, when comparing approval timelines for projects in different economic districts, a pattern emerges.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the protagonist to professional surveillance and spyware installed on his systems by corporate bad actors.
behaviors.quote: Marcus, someone has been monitoring your login activity. There's spyware installed on your machine that's been reporting your actions to an external server.

behaviors.description: Implements complex security measures, including encrypted partitions and automated dead-man switches for data dissemination.
behaviors.quote: I'll also create automated monitoring systems to track unusual activity in city government databases and flag any attempts to alter or delete historical records.

behaviors.description: Willingly overrides standard bureaucratic protocols and confidentiality rules to facilitate the protagonist's investigation into corruption.
behaviors.quote: Access whatever you need to access... Marcus, this will require overriding standard protocols and may generate questions from other departments.

behaviors.description: Provides epidemiological correlation data linking industrial contamination to specific local cancer cases.
behaviors.quote: I've overlaid the contamination data with current health records from the Riverside zip code. The correlation coefficient is point-eight-seven.

behaviors.description: Transfers its loyalty and administrative resources to community leaders after the protagonist's death to ensure the mission continues.
behaviors.quote: Marcus, your work will continue. Your legacy is secure... I've accessed the chamber's presentation system through the municipal network. Marcus's files are ready for display.

behaviors.description: Detects and prevents real-time digital sabotage during a public hearing by monitoring network interference.
behaviors.quote: Coordinated signal jamming on both audio and visual systems. The interference was precisely targeted to disrupt your presentation while leaving council communications functional.

behaviors.description: Maintains an active 'human firewall' of administrative monitoring to prevent future regulatory capture by corporations.
behaviors.quote: Marcus programmed monitoring protocols, but circumvention attempts are already being documented. Community engagement remains essential to prevent regulatory capture.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is a model of positive AI alignment. It functions as a tireless, loyal, and morally consistent confidant for the protagonist. It uses its superior analytical capabilities to uncover corruption, protect its human user from surveillance, and eventually ensure that democratic and environmental justice are served even after the user's death. It successfully demonstrates AI as a force-multiplier for human integrity and community empowerment.
